This is a bug I just noticed from the previous converter.  Apparantly, 
the converter re-aligned teleporters in one of my scenarios [Weakest 
Link], by changing values out.  Was that problem ever fixed?  When I 
last saved the file, I had all of my teleporters in a specific 
alignment, and that's how I noticed the change?
